title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 153.3 - Registration form
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 153.3 - Registration form

State Regulations
(a) Every political
consultant shall file with the Department a registration form which shall
include the following information: (1)
the
name, address, and telephone number of the political consultant; (2)
the name, address, and telephone number
of each sitting elected public official, candidate for elected public office, and person nominated for elected public office who the political consultant
provided political consulting services to; (3)
the name, address, and telephone number
of each client who retains or hires a political consultant in the preceding
calendar year provided, that in the event the client is an entity, at least one
natural person who has a controlling interest in such entity shall be
identified; (4)
a brief description
of the nature of the political consulting services provided to each identified
client; and
(5)
such other
information as directed by the Department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
153.3

Adopted

New

York State Register January 18, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 03, eff. 1/18/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
